// trace into all fpm threads  
ps -ef | grep fpm | awk '{print "-p " $2}' | xargs strace


// 挂载为指定用户  
work.src    /media/sf_work.src    vboxsf    gid=500,uid=500,umask=022,rw    0   0


// Timestamp
date +%s --date='2015-11-10 15:16:12'
date -d @1372993650


// vi
:w  !sudo   tee  %
